_description: CyAudit Automated Pipeline Configuration - Edit this file to customize your deployment
_ClientName_help: Your organization name (used in CyAudit reporting)
_ComputerName_help: Computer to audit (leave blank to use current computer, can override with -ComputerName parameter)
_OutputBasePath_help: Where CyAudit stores raw assessment output (each run creates timestamped subdirectory). Relative paths resolve next to this script.
_SplunkReadyPath_help: Where transformed Splunk-ready JSON files are written (monitored by Universal Forwarder). Relative paths resolve next to this script.
_LogPath_help: Where pipeline execution logs are stored. Relative paths resolve next to this script.
_ValidateOutput_help: Run validation tests on transformed data (recommended: true)
_FailOnValidationError_help: Stop pipeline if validation fails (false = continue despite validation errors)
_RetentionDays_help: Delete assessments/logs older than this many days (0 = never delete)

CyAuditOptions._OutputPath_help: Override default CyAudit output path (null = use CyAudit default which is current directory)
CyAuditOptions._IncludeHTML_help: Generate HTML reports (true = generate, false = skip for faster execution)
CyAuditOptions._StigDataSource_help: STIG data source preference: 'auto' (try PowerSTIG first, fallback to local), 'local' (use local STIG files only), 'powerstig' (use PowerSTIG module only)
CyAuditOptions._LocalStigDataPath_help: Path to local STIG data folder (null = use default ../STIGS folder)

EmailAlerts._Enabled_help: Enable email notifications (requires SMTP configuration below)
EmailAlerts._SendOnSuccess_help: Send email on successful completion (false = only send on failure)
EmailAlerts._SmtpServer_help: SMTP server hostname or IP address
EmailAlerts._To_help: Email address(es) for notifications (comma-separated for multiple)
EmailAlerts._Credential_help: SMTP authentication (set to object with Username and Password properties, or null for anonymous)

_IMPORTANT_NOTES: 1. All paths must use double backslashes (\\) in JSON format
2. Ensure the service account running the scheduled task has permissions to all specified directories
3. The SplunkReadyPath should match the path configured in Universal Forwarder inputs.conf
4. RetentionDays cleanup runs after each successful pipeline execution
5. Email alerts require network access to SMTP server from the system running the pipeline
6. Fields starting with underscore (_) are comments and are ignored by the script
